definition: color of the sky/time of day, as indicated by the color of the sky/weather

sentences.english: The sky was dark on the evening that the Tyrant's emissaries came to Tegea.
sentences.chinese: 在叙拉古的使者来到忒格亚的那天晚上天色很黑。

sentences.english: It's late at night and you're tired.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚而且你也累了。

sentences.english: Tom:I had a great time tonight, but it's getting late. I really should be going.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我玩得真高兴，但是天色渐晚，我真的该走了。

sentences.english: The sky started to grow lighter and the shadow in the little town less dark.
sentences.chinese: 天色渐渐发白，小镇里的阴影处也慢慢亮了起来。

sentences.english: Sky gradually dim, empty river Piaoqi the thick strands of rain drift.
sentences.chinese: 天色渐渐暗淡，空旷的河面飘起了密密的雨丝。

sentences.english: It was the end of November and the day was very cheerless.
sentences.chinese: 已经是十一月底了，天色十分阴暗。

sentences.english: The chamber was lighted by the fire on the hearth and the twilight falling through the window.
sentences.chinese: 房间利用火炉的光和从窗子透进来的黄昏天色来照明。

sentences.english: When dark fell, Han Tse disguised himself as a fisherman and sailed to the north bank of the river.
sentences.chinese: 天色黑定后，阚泽扮作渔翁，驾船向北岸驶去。

sentences.english: It is getting dark, so I must hurry home.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚，我得赶紧回家了。

sentences.english: It was late when I got home.
It darkens but the track is still seen.
sentences.chinese: 天色变暗了，但仍然看的见车痕。

sentences.english: It was snowing, and getting dark.
The sky overhead throbbed and pulsed with light.
sentences.chinese: 天色清澈明朗，阳光温暖。

sentences.english: I am too busy to go for a walk, besides, it is late.
sentences.chinese: 我太忙不能去散步，而且天色已晚。

sentences.english: After sunset , the sky darkened rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏过后，天色很快地黑下来了。

sentences.english: He looked around at everything, but since it was already late, he went out to Bethany with the Twelve.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚，就和十二个门徒出城，往伯大尼去了。

definition: white (paint from dried fish guts)/marble white color of the dawn sky
night scene/the dim light of night
the sun sets in the west (idiom)
